medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient awoke at 4 AM with diffuse severe abdominal pain that persisted and localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient felt feverish with chills upon awakening. No nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, or constipation reported. Last bowel movement was normal.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past surgical history includes knee arthroscopy; no other past medical history specified.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes sisters with diverticulitis; no cancers reported.
